attributes.action: Demote Vicky Ford from Children’s Minister role
attributes.background: The fact that the Children’s minister voted against feeding the poverty ridden children in the UK is an absolute political embarrassment and disgrace. She has made it quite clear that her loyalties and priorities don’t coincide with the children of this country.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments.  That incldues petitions that call for people to be sacked.
